content: Agree with all of the above, Seb! Not included in this essay but part of my deck/presentation, was another graphic full of people from other departments, and the trickle-down effect of incremental, internal digital education. I now run a monthly inter-deparmental meeting with representatives from every division — curatorial, collections, education, development, registrars, IT — with the objective to make everyone a stakeholder and contributor. Something that would not have been achievable at the scale of a larger institution, for sure!
